scripts.dev: cross-env-shell USE_MSW=true NODE_ENV=development HOTSAK_API_URL=http://hm-saksbehandling.test BRILLE_API_URL=http://hm-brille-api.test FARO_URL=http://faro.test GRUNNDATA_API_URL=http://hm-grunndata-search.test tsx --enable-source-maps src/server.mts
scripts.start: cross-env-shell USE_MSW=true NODE_ENV=development HOTSAK_API_URL=http://hm-saksbehandling.test BRILLE_API_URL=http://hm-brille-api.test FARO_URL=http://faro.test GRUNNDATA_API_URL=http://hm-grunndata-search.test node --enable-source-maps dist/server.mjs
